content.text:
[@jer](@uf3kajfhBC2Sd3OysKB5LnBLJ5pwgBhBpXnGEGzgG6A=.ed25519) 

> Seriously though, all comedy is rooted in offense, exaduration, or similar

Which [theory of humor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theories_of_humor) is this? And how did you come to believe that theory of humor? Your belief that comedy is rooted in *being offensive* is contradictory to many / most existing theories, so I'm curious how you came to that conclusion.
